def has_message_body(status):
    """
    According to the following RFC message body and length SHOULD NOT
    be included in responses status 1XX, 204 and 304.
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.4
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.3
    """
    # Status codes that must not include a message body:
    # 1xx (Informational), 204 (No Content), and 304 (Not Modified)
    return not (100 <= status < 200 or status == 204 or status == 304)

def has_message_body(status):
    """
    According to the following RFC message body and length SHOULD NOT
    be included in responses status 1XX, 204 and 304.
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.4
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.3
    """
    if (100 <= status < 200) or status in (204, 304):
        return False
    return True

def has_message_body(status):
    """
    According to the following RFC message body and length SHOULD NOT
    be included in responses status 1XX, 204 and 304.
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.4
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.3
    """
    # Per RFC 2616, responses with status codes:
    # 1xx (100–199), 204, and 304 do not have a message body.
    # All other status codes normally do have a message body.
    return not (
        (100 <= status < 200) or status == 204 or status == 304
    )

def has_message_body(status):
    """
    According to the following RFC message body and length SHOULD NOT
    be included in responses status 1XX, 204 and 304.
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.4
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.3
    """
    # Per RFC 2616, the following response statuses must not include a message body:
    # 1xx (Informational), 204 (No Content), 304 (Not Modified)
    if (100 <= status < 200) or status in (204, 304):
        return False
    return True

def has_message_body(status):
    """
    According to the following RFC message body and length SHOULD NOT
    be included in responses status 1XX, 204 and 304.
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.4
    https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616#section-4.3
    """
    # Per RFC 2616 sections referenced:
    # 1xx, 204, and 304 responses MUST NOT include a message body
    # All other responses MAY include a message body
    
    # Check if status falls into the known no-message-body categories
    # 1xx (100-199), 204, 304
    if (100 <= status < 200) or status in (204, 304):
        return False
    return True
